project_descr: This project is Supported by the austrian Trust Fund to mainstream HIV/AIDS in the national institutions of Agriculture, Transport, Prisons and Police.

outputs.output_descr:
Gender-responsive assessment of AIDS spending for public sector, civil society and private sector completed; A national system and process for tracking HIV resources across public sector established; Vulnerability and risk analysis to HIV and AIDS in 4 sectors  conducted; Sector investment plans for the 4 sectors reviewed to ensure they include HIV/AIDS and gender emerging issues.
5. HIV/AIDS strategic plans for 4 sectors reviewed and aligned to the NSP on HIV/AIDS 6. Sector personnel's capacity in HIV/AIDS and gender mainstreaming in development planning developed.
